title: SVG to ICO Converter - Free & Online | miconvert.com
sub_title: Convert SVG images to ICO format online for favicons and desktop icons. Free, fast, and no watermarks.
hint: Upload your SVG image to start converting...
description:
Transform your SVG to ICO for perfect favicons and desktop icons! Our free converter rasterizes your vector SVG to crisp multi-size ICO that works across browsers and Windows desktops.

ICO can bundle several sizes in one file (e.g., 16–256 px), so your icon looks sharp on tabs, shortcuts, and high-DPI displays. Transparency is preserved for smooth edges on light and dark backgrounds.

head.title: Convert SVG to ICO Online - Free SVG to ICO Converter | miconvert.com

head.og_title: SVG to ICO Converter - Free & Online
head.og_description: Convert SVG images into ICO format for favicons and desktop icons. 100% free, fast, and secure.

h1.title: Convert SVG to ICO Online
h1.description: Free and fast SVG to ICO converter for favicons and desktop icons. Works instantly on any device — no signup required.

h2.title: Why Convert SVG to ICO?
h2.description:
SVG gives you resolution-independent shapes; ICO gives you native icon compatibility:

  • Multi-size support: Bundle 16–256 px variants in one file.
  • Favicon standard: Widely recognized by browsers.
  • Windows compatibility: Native format for desktop/app icons.
  • Transparency: Smooth edges with alpha preserved.

h2.title: How to Convert SVG to ICO Online
h2.description:
1. Click Upload SVG and select your vector file.
  2. Wait for rasterization and optimization.
  3. Click Download ICO to save your icon.

We generate common sizes automatically for sharp results.

h2.title: ICO Format Specifications
h2.description:
• Standard sizes: 16×16, 32×32, 48×48, 64×64, 128×128, 256×256 px
  • Color depth: Up to 32-bit RGBA
  • Compression: PNG-compressed entries for 32-bit icons (Vista+)
  • Structure: Header + multiple image entries in one file

h2.title: Supported Limits & Formats
h2.description:
• Accepted input: SVG (image/svg+xml)
  • Maximum file size: up to 16 MB per file
  • Output: ICO (.ico, MIME image/x-icon)

h2.title: Troubleshooting
h2.description:
• Favicon not showing: Clear cache and ensure /favicon.ico is linked via <link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico">.
  • Fonts/filters: Non-embedded fonts, complex filters, or external assets may rasterize differently. Convert text to outlines and inline assets in the SVG.
  • Cropping: Use a square artboard with padding to avoid clipping after rasterization.
  • Upload fails: Ensure SVG ≤ 16 MB and valid image/svg+xml.

h2.title: Best Practices
h2.description:
• Design on a 512×512 or 1024×1024 square canvas for clean downscales.
  • Keep shapes bold; avoid thin hairlines at small sizes.
  • Use high contrast for readability in 16–32 px icons.

h2.title: Features of Our SVG to ICO Converter
h2.description:
• 100% Free with no watermarks
  • Automatic vector→raster conversion
  • Multi-size icon generation
  • Transparency preserved
  • Secure processing

faq.question: Is this SVG to ICO converter free?
faq.answer: Yes, the converter is completely free with no hidden charges or subscriptions.

faq.question: What sizes are supported in ICO files?
Can I use ICO for website favicons?
faq.answer: Yes. Place /favicon.ico at your site root and reference it with <link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico">.

faq.question: What file sizes are supported?
faq.answer: You can upload SVG files up to 16 MB.

faq.question: Are my files safe?
faq.answer: Files are processed automatically and not retained longer than necessary for conversion.

faq.question: Will the icon quality be good?
faq.answer: Yes. We rasterize from your vector at multiple sizes to keep edges crisp and transparency intact.

note: SVGs are rasterized during conversion. For consistent results, convert text to outlines and embed required assets.
